description: Irish minister for health signs regulations giving garda¨ª new powers to enforce restrictions.
title: Coronavirus: Irish police get powers to enforce Covid-19 rules
title_page: Coronavirus: Irish police get powers to enforce Covid-19 rules - BBC News
maintext: "The Irish people are being super, but it is important that the garda¨ª have these powers in their back pocket so that if they do need enforcement powers, they have them."
